nav.div: Lynden School District » Parents/Students » School Closure/Inclement Weather

div.span: When winter is in the air, learn about Lynden and other Whatcom County school closures or delays multiple ways. Lynden Schools posts updates on their Facebook page and Twitter account. Or view a list of school closures by clicking on the below links website.
Remember to refresh your webpage to view updated information
You can tune in to any of the following radio stations:

span.strong: KAFE 104.1 FM KISM 92.9 FM KWPZ 106.5 FM

div.span: Beginning at 6:00 AM, school closure and delay changes are announced every fifteen minutes.
You can watch any of the following Seattle TV stations:

span.style: font-family: Verdana, serif, EmojiFont; font-size: 13px; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);

br.span: Lynden School District encourages families and staff to use their best judgement when traveling to and from school on inclement weather days.

div.span: Click on the falling snow to see if it's snowing in Lynden

div.div:
1203 Bradley Road, Lynden, WA 98264
Phone 360-354-4443 | Fax 360-354-7662

div.p: Lynden School District does not discriminate in any programs or activities on the basis of sex, race, creed, religion, color, national origin, age, veteran or military status, sexual orientation, gender expression, gender identity, marital status, disability, or the use of a trained dog guide or service animal, and provides equal access to all youth groups identified in U.S.C., Title 36. The District has designated the following employees to handle questions and complaints of alleged discrimination: Civil Rights Compliance Coordinator Jim Frey (freyj@lynden.wednet.edu | 360-354-4443), and Title IX Officer and Section 504 Coordinator Tim Metz (metzt@lynden.wednet.edu | 360-354-2952). Address: 516 Main St., Lynden, WA 98264.
